data.caption: Corporate Guarantee
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations 2015 we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of Ventive Hospitality Meeting at its meeting held on December 23 2025 approved the issuance of Corporate Guarantee in favour of ICICI Bank Limited to secure the Credit facilities to be availed by Kudakurathu Island Resorts Private Limited a subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Held On Tuesday December 23 2025.
data.news_body: Pursuant to Regulation 30 of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations 2015 read with Schedule III thereof we wish to inform that the Board of Directors of Ventive Hospitality Limited at its meeting held on December 23 2025 approved the issuance of a corporate guarantee in favour of ICICI Bank Limited to secure the credit facilities to be availed by Kudakurathu Island Resorts Private Limited a subsidiary of the Company.

data.caption: Announcement under Regulation 30 (LODR)-Press Release / Media Release
data.news_body: Exploration of potential acquisition by Ventive Hospitality Limited through its Material Subsidiary

data.caption: Exploration Of Potential Acquisition By Ventive Hospitality Limited Through Its Material Subsidiary.
data.news_body: Ventive Hospitality Limited through its material subsidiary namely Panchshil Corporate Park Private Limited ("PCCPL") proposes to enter into a Non-binding agreement with the Target Entity to explore the potential acquisition of its business. If consummated the proposed transaction would also result in the acquisition of the Target entitys subsidiaries which hold exclusive rights for Soho House Expansion in India and operate Soho House Mumbai (Juhu). The proposal remains subject to completion of Due Diligence execution of definitive agreement and compliance with all applicable laws and regulatory approvals.

data.caption: Closure of Trading Window
data.news_body: Pursuant to SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading) Regulations 2015 and the Companys Code of Conduct for Regulating Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders the Trading Window for dealing in securities of the Company shall remain close w.e.f October 1 2025 and shall re-open after 48 hours from announcement of Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the quarter ended September 30 2025. Accordingly the Designated Persons their immediate relatives and other Insiders of the Company are advised not to deal in Securities of the Company during the aforesaid period.
